variables.name: VERSION_FILE
variables.desc: The YAML file that contains the version definition.

variables.name: VERSION_PATH
variables.desc: The version variable path inside the YAML file.

variables.name: ADD_GIT_LOG
variables.desc: Whether to add Git commit info in a changelog.

variables.name: GIT_LOG_PATH
variables.desc: The path for the Git changelog (using Markdown format).

variables.name: REPO_BRANCH
variables.desc: The repo branch to do the bump operation inside.

variables.name: VERSION_BUMP_MESSAGE_PREFIX
variables.desc: Message to start the version commit message with.

variables.name: ATOM_ROBOT_USERNAME
variables.desc: The robot username inside git configurations.

variables.name: ATOM_ROBOT_EMAIL
variables.desc: The robot email inside git configurations.

variables.name: VERSION_DELIMITER
variables.desc: Version delimiter between minor and major versions.

variables.name: BUMP_TYPE
variables.desc: Whether to bump the minor or the major versions.
